 HyprSettings Debug Mode

    HyprSettings Outdated

    Hello! How are you?

    We are now in beta!. (yay!) Lots of things has changed since and we are now at a more stable version. Still, please visit the  Github repo and don't hesistate to ask for help and report pesky bugs.

    A config has been written to ~/.config/hypr/hyprsettings.toml
    A font has been automatically chosen.
    If you don't see this droplet , or if you have a preferred font, please exit and change the font to a in the config file to some Nerd Font.(and comeback please XD)

    What's working?

    • The keybind, line comment editor.
    • You can remove # to turn line comment to a key(if valid)
    • Theming, settings, Autosaving! a lot actually. just check it out!
    • Adding items from the known lists
    • Group duplication
    • Bezier animation editing with preview

    What's not (yet) working

    • Keyboard navigation inside items.

    Usage:

    • Arrows, Tab: Navigation
    • Enter, Space: Open a key editor modal/ Modify value
    • Esc: Leave the opened editor modal
    • Delete: Delete(lol)

    Extra keys:(feature testing)

    • F1: Show/hide this screen
    • F3: See your config Texts
    • F5: Reload everything
    • F6: Secret share screen

    Next updates:

    • Prio: Navigation inside keys
    • More editor modals

    To check for updates, go to the settings tab. You can always rerun the installation method you did and it will automatically fetch updates from the repo

    You can go back here by pressing F1

    F3 Debug Screen

    Config Preview

    Press F3 to get out of this screen
